page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content:
Each village has a very old Anglican Parish church,St.James in Idlicote,St. Lawrence in Oxhill and St.Peters in Whatcote.
Oxhill and Whatcote are joined with the parish of Tysoe and the vicar is Rev.I.Lilley.Idlecote comes under Rev.R.Williams of Shipston. All three churches are of at least Norman origin,and all contain some unusual features.St.Peters has some major structural defects probably as a result of wartime damage,but restoration work is about to start.
Catholic villagers worship at Brailes, Kineton,or Shipston.
Oxhill and Whatcote have Methodist Chaples in the Kineton circuit,under Rev.Dr.D.F.Clark.
